name: Kandagawa Jet Girls DX Jet Pack: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Kandagawa Jet Girls
Hanaharu Naruko-designed special box
Game original anime Blu-ray disc “Tokyo Girls Promotion Starts Here” (approximately 21 minutes)
Two-disc soundtrack CD including the theme song (54 tracks, approximately 119 minutes)
Special art book (over 60 pages)
Limited edition box art
Additional character downloadable content: “Yumi and Asuka Enter the Race from Senran Kagura“
